si.title: පාර්ලිමේන්තුවේ ලිංගිකත්වය: තිදෙනෙකු අත්අඩංගුවට
body_lines: පොලීසිය කාර්යාංශයේ කාර්යාංශයට අනුව පාර්ලිමේන්තුවේ නිවාස ආරක්ෂණ දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවේ කනිෂ් markerar කම්කරුවන් තිදෙනෙකු අත්අඩංගුවට ගෙන ඇති බව පොලිසිය කාර්යාංශයේ කාර්යාංශය පවසයි.
இந்த விடயம் தொடர்பில் அந்த பணியகத்தின் அதிகாரிகள் அண்மையில் பாராளுமன்ற வளாகத்திற்கு சென்று விசாரணைகளை மேற்கொண்டுள்ளனர்.
ලිංගික හිරිහැර සිදුවීම සම්බන්ධයෙන් පාර්ලිමේන්තු සහකාර පරිපාලක ඇතුළු දෙදෙනෙකු අත්හිටුවා තිබේ.

en.title: Sexuality in Parliament: Three arrested
body_lines: Three junior workers of Parliament's Home Care Department have been arrested in connection with the incident of two beautiful maids being raped, according to the Bureau of Police.
Officials of the Bureau have recently visited the Parliamentary Complex and are investigating the matter.
Two persons, including a parliamentary assistant administrator, have been suspended in connection with the sexual harassment incident.

summary_lines: Three junior workers in Parliament's Home Care Department arrested for the rape of two maids. Two, including a parliamentary assistant administrator, suspended. Police investigation ongoing.
